adrFormatAddress: 1879 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10031-1716, USA

originalText.text: Levy & Delany provides high level service. Ms. Lynn Whiting, Funeral Director, was so helpful to both me and my family in making the final arrangements for my wife. She was compassionate, kind, and very helpful that I deeply appreciated. Lynn’s team was also extremely professional and respectful. She made my wife’s homegoing services a truly beautiful event. I am so thankful to have used her services.

text.text: Levy & Delany provides high level service. Ms. Lynn Whiting, Funeral Director, was so helpful to both me and my family in making the final arrangements for my wife. She was compassionate, kind, and very helpful that I deeply appreciated. Lynn’s team was also extremely professional and respectful. She made my wife’s homegoing services a truly beautiful event. I am so thankful to have used her services.

originalText.text:
My family and I are forever grateful for Gary, and the Levy and Delany Funeral Home. A mere review is not sufficient enough of a way for us to express our gratitude.

Gary was with me every step of the way. From the moment I called him - this time to inform him that my grandfather had passed - all the way to my grandpa's internment. I had called a few moments before that same day to set up a time to speak the following day. My grandfather was still alive in those moments. I was still processing the shock of his passing and the irony of the timing.

The funeral, how my grandfather was dressed and embalmed - he looked great and at peace. For such a grievous occasion it gave us immeasurable comfort to see my grandfather in that way. Thank you. His dedication page on the site, the beautiful poem that was truly fitting, to adding the Yankee icon to his page. Thank you so much.

Thank you, Gary for your dedication, advice, care, and guidance. Many thanks to Levy and Delany for helping us give my Papa Mario a dignified service, mass, and internment. We were treated with such care, kindness, and compassion and provided with all that we need. We felt like family, and we truly see Gary, Levy and Delany like a part of our family. Thank you truly and God bless you all.

originalText.text: Yesterday was the service for my cousin and everything was well done. This is the third time Levy & Delany has taken care of the funeral arrangements for a family member. They also did the arrangements for my uncle about 2 months ago and my grandmother during Covid. Everything was done with care and professionalism. Ms. Whiting knows her business and provides top notch customer service during this difficult time.

text.text: Yesterday was the service for my cousin and everything was well done. This is the third time Levy & Delany has taken care of the funeral arrangements for a family member. They also did the arrangements for my uncle about 2 months ago and my grandmother during Covid. Everything was done with care and professionalism. Ms. Whiting knows her business and provides top notch customer service during this difficult time.

originalText.text:
After the recent death of my father, I was completely unsure of what to do. Enter Jocelyn Whiting of Levy & Delany Funeral Home. From the moment I called her, she was polite, patient, and professional with me. No question went unanswered, and no time was inconvenient. She provided me with a wealth of information that guided me on how to proceed, without trying to force me to do what was best for her bottom line. I was not treated like a client; I was treated like family. She made an incredibly difficult period much easier to handle, by taking care of many details that allowed us time to actually grieve for our beloved. For that, my family and I are forever grateful.

Thank you, Ms. Whiting and Levy & Delany!

originalText.text: Levy & Delany Funeral Home had been overlooked because the service provided is impeccable. Our reasons for using they service was for a very special reason that I chose not to disclose but calling them was the best decision I made for my family. Ms. Lynn is an angel sent from God himself this lady from the 1st phone to this morning has been a true blessing. There isn't enough words in the word to describe Ms. Lynn and her team I thank you beyond words. From my family and I
